mapper.select: select T1.F_ShipNo as fShipno ,T1.IMONo as imono ,T1.ShipNumber as shipnumber ,T1.ShipType as shiptype ,case when (T1.ShipNationality is not null and T1.ShipNationality != '') and (T3.CountryNameJP is not null and T3.CountryNameJP != '' ) then concat(T1.ShipNationality,'：', T3.CountryNameJP) else '' end as shipnationality ,case when (T1.ShipSpecies is not null and T1.ShipSpecies != '') and (T2.ShipSpeciesNameJP is not null and T2.ShipSpeciesNameJP != '' ) then concat(T1.ShipSpecies ,'：', T2.ShipSpeciesNameJP) else '' end as shipspecies ,T1.ShipNameJP as shipnamejp ,T1.Series as series ,T1.GrossTonnage as grosstonnage ,T1.ShipClass as shipclass ,case when (T1.ShipyardCode is not null and T1.ShipyardCode != '') and (T5.ShipyardNameJP is not null and T5.ShipyardNameJP != '' ) then concat(T1.ShipyardCode ,'：',T5.ShipyardNameJP) else '' end as shipyard ,T1.BuildDate as builddate ,case when (T1.CustomerCode is not null and T1.CustomerCode != '') and (T4.CustomerNameJP is not null and T4.CustomerNameJP != '' ) then concat(T1.CustomerCode,'：',T4.CustomerNameJP) else '' end as customer from SHP_SPM_SC_Ship T1 left outer join SHP_SPM_SC_ShipSpecies T2 on T1.ShipSpecies = T2.ShipSpecies left outer join SHP_SPM_SC_Country T3 on T1.ShipNationality = T3.CountryCode left outer join SHP_SPM_SC_Customer T4 on T1.ShipyardCode = T4.CustomerCode left outer join SHP_SPM_SC_Shipyard T5 on T1.ShipyardCode = T5.ShipyardCode where T1.F_ShipNo = #{fshipno}

select T1.EquipmentID as equipmentid ,case when T1.Status = '1' then '削除' else '' end as status ,case when (T1.ModelCode is not null and T1.ModelCode != '') and (T4.ModelNameJP is not null and T4.ModelNameJP != '' ) then concat(T1.ModelCode,'：', T4.ModelNameJP) else '' end as model ,case when (T2.IdentificationNameJP is not null and T2.IdentificationNameJP != '') and (T1.IdentificationName is not null and T1.IdentificationName != '' ) then concat(T2.IdentificationNameJP, ' ', T1.IdentificationName) else '' end as identification ,T3.MachineNum as machinenum ,T1.ShippingDate as shippingdate ,T1.EquipmentDate as equipmentdate ,T1.SalesJurisdict as salesjurisdict ,T1.ShipyardWarrantyDate as shipyardwarrantydate ,T1.WarrantyDate as warrantydate ,T1.Remarks as remarks from SHP_SPM_SC_Equipment T1 left outer join SHP_SPM_SC_Identification T2 on T1.IdentificationCode = T2.IdentificationCode left outer join SHP_SPM_SC_Item T3 on T1.EquipmentID = T3.EquipmentID left outer join SHP_SPM_SC_Model T4 on T1.ModelCode = T4.ModelCode where T1.F_ShipNo = #{fshipno}
